title: Did Lady Gaga say that she had "a friend who told me that I would never succeed? '
subtitle: After Oscar, Golden Globe and multiple romance awards, it's safe to say Lady Gaga proved wrong in doubting her ex-boyfriend.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Lady Gaga said, "I have a friend who told me I'd never succeed... You told him one day you wouldn't be able to order a cup of coffee without hearing about me."
